Spain: Siege of Coria (1142): Alfonso the Emperor laid siege to the Almoravid city of Coria, Caceres.
Siege of Coria (1142): The Almoravid garrison surrendered.
China: Yue was executed on false charges of treason spurred by the Song chancellor Qin Hui.
Canada: The Iroquois Confederacy (also known as the League of Peace and Power) is formed.
